message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1100000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my needs and budget, I would like to propose a price of $1050000.

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product to you for $1075000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
